abilities.name: Fog of Dreams
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

abilities.name: Treacherous Illusion
abilities.rule: Melee weapons equipped by enemy models have the **[HAZARDOUS]** ability while targeting this model’s unit.

abilities.name: Flip Belt
abilities.rule: Each time the bearer’s unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, ignore any vertical distance when determining the total distance the bearer can be moved during that move.

wargear_abilities.name: Flip Belt
wargear_abilities.rule: Each time the bearer’s unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, ignore any vertical distance when determining the total distance the bearer can be moved during that move.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s shuriken pistol can be replaced with 1 neuro disruptor.
